questions.q: How long does it take to train an AI model with my photos?
questions.a: With the new training model, training time is instant. Upload photos and you can already generate your photos.

questions.q: How long does it take to generate profile photos?
questions.a: Photos are ready in 1 to 2 minutes. Previously you need to train the model with your selfies.

questions.q: What type of photos should I upload to create AI profile photos?
questions.a: We recommend uploading photos with high variety, a mix of close-up selfies and full-body photos in different places, angles, clothes and expressions. Don't upload photos with low variety, group photos, other people, sunglasses, hats, photos where your face is cut off or not visible.

questions.q: How much will the photos look like me?
questions.a: The similarity of the photos to you depends on the quality and variety of the photos you upload. The better and more varied your photos are, the more accurate the AI can be in understanding and representing your unique features. We continue to improve our models every day.

questions.q: Is my information secure? Do my photos and models remain private?
questions.a: Yes! The models you create and the photos you upload and take remain private. Your personal data, images and AI models are stored securely, and our system is designed to protect your information from unauthorized access.

questions.q: Who can use my AI profile photos?
questions.a: No one. Your photos will be yours only. After 30 days they will be deleted from our servers.
Yes, we offer a full refund guarantee if you are not satisfied with the results.

buyCredits.title: Credits
buyCredits.subtitle: Buy credits to create your AI photos.
buyCredits.giftCardsDesc: Give AI selfies to friends and family.
buyCredits.forBusinessesDesc: Professional AI photos for teams and businesses

faq.q: Do credits expire?
faq.a: No, credits do not expire. However, the AI model you trained expires after 30 days. You must use your credits within that time.

faq.q: What style of photos will I receive?
faq.a: Once your AI model is trained, you can select different styles from the Create tab. Each time you generate a photo in a selected style, you'll receive 4 different variants in that style. This allows you to experiment with various looks and choose your favorites.

faq.q: How long does it take to generate photos?
faq.a: The process happens in two steps: First, we train your AI model, which takes 15-30 minutes. After that, you can generate photos at any time, and each generation takes only 1-2 minutes to create 4 variants.

faq.q: Do you offer refunds?
faq.a: Yes, we offer a 100% refund guarantee if you are not satisfied with the quality of your photos. You can request a full refund within the first 7 days after your purchase.

faq.q: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a: We process all transactions using Stripe. You can pay using credit card, PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay and more.

faq.q: How do I ensure the quality of my photos?
faq.a: Before training a model, we recommend reading our guide. This way you'll ensure that the generated photos are of the best possible quality.

faq.q: Who can use my photos and what about privacy?
faq.a: Your photos are exclusively yours. We prioritize your privacy and automatically delete all generated photos from our database after 30 days. The photos you generate are for your personal use and will not be shared or accessible to anyone else.

faq.q: What if the generated photos don't look like me?
faq.a: If you follow our instructions for selecting training images, you should get around 80% usable photos that look like you. We continuously update our models to improve accuracy. If you have doubts before starting, don't hesitate to contact us for guidance.

faq.q: Will the AI learn my unique characteristics?
faq.a: Yes, our AI is excellent at understanding and replicating what makes you unique. You can also adjust specific characteristics when generating images, such as whether you wear glasses or other distinctive features.

faq.q: Where can I use these photos?
faq.a: The photos are versatile and can be used anywhere you need a professional image of yourself. They're perfect for professional profile photos (LinkedIn, company websites), social media (Instagram, Facebook, Twitter) or personal branding. You can choose different dimensions like square format for profile photos or portrait mode for Instagram stories and other vertical designs.

faq.q: How does the affiliate program work?
faq.a: You'll get a unique affiliate link to share. When someone signs up using your link and makes a purchase, you'll earn a 30% commission on every sale you generate.

faq.q: When do I get paid?
faq.a: We process payments monthly for all commissions earned in the previous month.

faq.q: Is there a minimum payout?
faq.a: Yes, the minimum payout is $25. Once you reach this threshold, we'll process your payment in the next payment cycle.

afiliados.readyToStartDesc: Join our affiliate program today and start generating passive income!

giftCards.title: Gift Cards
giftCards.subtitle: Give AISelfi.es to friends and family.

faq.q: How do gift cards work?
faq.a: When you buy a gift card, you'll receive a unique code that you can share with anyone. The recipient can use this code during checkout to redeem the full value of the gift card package.

faq.q: Can gift cards be used multiple times?
faq.a: No, each gift card code can only be used once. The full value of the package will be applied when the code is redeemed.

faq.q: Do gift cards expire?
faq.a: No, our gift cards never expire. The recipient can use them whenever they're ready to create their AI-generated photos.

faq.q: What if I buy the wrong package?
faq.a: Each gift card is specific to the package purchased (Starter, Pro or Premium). The recipient will receive exactly what's included in that package.

faq.q: How will I receive the gift card?
faq.a: After successful payment, you'll be redirected to a confirmation page that displays your unique gift card code. You can copy this code and share it with the recipient.

faq.q: What style of photos will I receive?
faq.a: Once your AI model is trained, you can select different styles from the Create tab. Each time you generate a photo in a selected style, you'll receive 4 different variants in that style. This allows you to experiment with various looks and choose your favorites.

faq.q: How long does it take to generate photos?
faq.a: The process happens in two steps: First, we train your AI model, which takes 15-25 minutes. After that, you can generate photos at any time, and each generation takes only 1-2 minutes to create 4 variants.

faq.q: Do you offer refunds?
faq.a: Yes, we offer a 100% refund guarantee if you are not satisfied with the quality of your photos. You can request a full refund within the first 7 days after your purchase.

faq.q: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a: We process all transactions using Stripe. You can pay using credit card, PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay and more.

faq.q: How do I ensure the quality of my photos?
faq.a: Before training a model, we recommend reading our guide. This way you'll ensure that the generated photos are of the best possible quality.

faq.q: Who can use my photos and what about privacy?
faq.a: Your photos are exclusively yours. We prioritize your privacy and automatically delete all generated photos from our database after 30 days. The photos you generate are for your personal use and will not be shared or accessible to anyone else.

faq.q: What if the generated photos don't look like me?
faq.a: If you follow our instructions for selecting training images, you should get around 80% usable photos that look like you. We continuously update our models to improve accuracy. If you have doubts before starting, don't hesitate to contact us for guidance.

faq.q: Will the AI learn my unique characteristics?
faq.a: Yes, our AI is excellent at understanding and replicating what makes you unique. You can also adjust specific characteristics when generating images, such as whether you wear glasses or other distinctive features.

faq.q: Where can I use these photos?
faq.a: The photos are versatile and can be used anywhere you need a professional image of yourself. They're perfect for professional profile photos (LinkedIn, company websites), social media (Instagram, Facebook, Twitter) or personal branding. You can choose different dimensions like square format for profile photos or portrait mode for Instagram stories and other vertical designs.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.description: We collect the following information when you use AISelfi:
items: Account information: name, email and login method
Uploaded photos: selfies you provide for processing
Payment data: processed securely by our partners
Usage data: how you interact with our platform

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
items: Process your photos using our AI technology
Manage your account and provide customer support
Process payments and prevent fraud
Improve our services and develop new features
Send important updates about the service

section3.title: 3. Storage and Security
section3.description: Your photos are stored securely on encrypted servers. We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, loss or alteration. Your original photos are kept only for the time necessary for processing and can be deleted upon request.

section4.title: 4. Data Sharing
section4.description: We do not sell your personal information. We may share data only with:
items: Service providers who help us operate the platform
Payment processors for financial transactions
Legal authorities when required by law

section5.title: 5. Your Rights
items: Access your personal information
Correct incorrect or incomplete data
Request deletion of your photos and data
Export your data in readable format
Withdraw consent for data processing

section6.title: 6. Cookies and Similar Technologies
section6.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience, analyze site usage and personalize content. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.

section7.title: 7. Data Retention
section7.description: We keep your information only for the time necessary to provide our services and fulfill legal obligations. Processed photos are stored in your account until you decide to delete them.

section8.title: 8. Changes to this Policy
section8.description: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes by email or through a notice on our website.

section9.title: 9. Contact
section9.description: For questions about privacy or to exercise your rights, contact us through the channels available on our website.

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.description: By accessing and using AISelfi, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you should not use our services.

section2.title: 2. Service Description
section2.description: AISelfi is a platform that uses artificial intelligence to generate professional photos from selfies provided by users. We offer different photo packages with various styles available.

section3.title: 3. Use of Images
section3.description: By uploading your photos to AISelfi, you:
items: Guarantee that you have all rights to the uploaded images
Grant AISelfi license to process your images using AI
Retain all ownership rights to the generated photos
Agree not to use the service for illegal or offensive content

section4.title: 4. Privacy and Security
section4.description: We take your privacy seriously. Your photos are processed securely and are not shared with third parties. See our Privacy Policy for more details on how we handle your data.

section5.title: 5. Payments and Refunds
section5.description: All payments are processed securely. Our refund policy:
items: Full refund if there is a technical failure in our service
We do not offer refunds for dissatisfaction with subjective results
Refund processing within 7 business days

section6.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
section6.description: AISelfi is not responsible for indirect, incidental or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use our services. Generated photos are created by AI and may not perfectly meet all users' expectations.

section7.title: 7. Modifications to Terms
section7.description: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of significant changes by email or through a notice on our website.

section8.title: 8. Contact
section8.description: For questions about these Terms of Service, contact us through WhatsApp or email available on our website.
